title: Pipe Spring National Monument: Nature
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature             Nature         Â© Paul Kister   There are many different animals and plants to explore at Pipe Spring National Monument. Nature and Science is where you can learn more about all the different types of animals and plants at Pipe Spring. Just choose from one of the links on the left, to explore more about the subject.  Science & Research Scientists at the Northern Colorado Plateau Network (NCPN) monitor the health and abundance of many species at Pipe Spring. Learn more about our current research and sustainability projects.
